name: AllMusic Dark Cobalt (by Jooch)
description:
I check in here all the time to keep my music collection organized. As usual i don't fancy white, so corrected all the white areas to ease the eyes while keeping the readability.

Also includes some hacks removing annoying dialogues.
additional_info:
Note: Not the entire site is covered, mostly the parts i frequently use.


10/12/2017 Update: Fixed some borders and backgrounds and styled search section.
8/12/2017 Update: Now in Beta stage, please report any issues or bugs.
